EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Your Transition (1384190043.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Walter, I will hold off on reaching out Clay until I hear otherwise. I still need to understand the nature of how is working to demine if we can support him anyhow since I can’t accommodate UK tax withholding. If he is subject to it MBO will not be able to engage him, I just need to learn more if and when that becomes appropriate. For your personal account, I have sent you a link to enroll which will be sent to you via a separate email from our system. We can hold your clearance, we will need a DD-254 from your customer also, please note the service fee is an additional percentage point more (6% instead of 5%). You can find more details on the security process by clicking here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf> I will send you an email to send your customer if and when introducing MBO becomes appropriate. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Walter Christman [mailto:president@globalstrategicanalysis.com] Sent: Sunday, November 10, 2013 2:23 AM To: Sara Conde Cc: Thomas Hazard Subject: Re: Your Transition Hi Sara, I still need to work out Clay's contract with my company, so hold off on reaching out to him for the moment. However, I have decided that in addition to signing up my company with MBO as a client, I will also sign myself up as an individual. I have a potential client for my own work that requires me to hold a security clearance and therefore I will need to avail myself of your facility for that purpose. I hold a DoD Secret Clearance. How do we proceed? Thanks, Walter On Tue, Nov 5, 2013 at 3:56 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Tom/Walter, Can one of you connect with me quickly via phone so I can understand the background on Clay and how we will be working with GSA? I want to make sure this in scope program before I reach out. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com From: Clayton Stewart [mailto:cstewart14@sky.com <mailto:cstewart14@sky.com>] Sent: Tuesday, November 05, 2013 3:16 PM To: Thomas Hazard Cc: Walter Christman; Sara Conde Subject: Re: Your Transition RESEND Tom, Great hearing from you. I agree about the unfortunate aspect of the NPS international group. I think it is really a travesty what the Navy did at NPS. I am very much looking forward to working with Walter and you on some international engagement. I am still an American citizen living in the UK on a temporary visa with a work permit. I've attached my resume incase it helps. Best Regards, Clay______________________________________________ Clayton Stewart, PhDInternational Science and TechnologyEngineering Management ConsultantLondon, UK+44(0) 7889 124115 Subject: Re: Your Transition Clay, The company I have established is basically a consulting network. I work to provide the global strategic context and network of relationships, and Tom Hazard as EVP and Director of Operations supports with the management of account relationships. Essentially what you see in the list of VPs and Directors of this and that is a business line established in partnership with an independent consultant. Each person signs an agreement with Global Strategic Analysis (GSA) stating that the title is awarded for business development and marketing purposes, but they are neither an employee, nor an officer of my company. Rather, each will be paid for work developed through MBO Partners, with all taxes, mandatory withholding, desired insurance and pension, etc managed by MBO. This means that you and anyone you bring into the network under you would get a W-2 and be deemed an MBO Partners employee, which by the way can also hold a DoD security clearance and also provide insurance for errors and omissions, thus protecting me. The other agreements to be included for signature are standard non-compete and non-disclosure clauses. This means someone can't just take contacts I have provided and do business without me, for a least awhile, and also my clients providing my firm funding passing through to you are also assured protection of their information. Bottom-line is that Tom and I have agreed we would like to invite you to be a Global Strategic Analysis member with the title of Vice President and Director for Science and Technology. We would work with you to monetize your Rolodex in identifying and developing client relationships, for which we would participate in the management and funding stream. Of course you could do any of this by yourself, but I think you would find the being part of our team is a value add, win-win proposition for all concerned. Among other things we would want to develop with you is a website and network of consultants, which could indeed span the globe. If you would like to proceed, I would ask Tom Hazard to get in contact with you and explore further. Warmest regards, Walter -- WALTER L.
